title: T206's - am in need of a Carlos Smith!
author: njdunkin1

posts.post_title: T206's - am in need of a Carlos Smith!
posts.post_content:
Hey hey hey! (insert Fat Albert reference here) I am looking to add the following T206's to my collection, please PM me if you have any and are willing to sell for a fair price. I am looking for raw cards, but have listed the approximate grade I can afford/am looking for if the card was to be graded. Strong eye appeal preferred!

-Carlos Smith, 1 - 1.5
-John Titus, Auth. - 1 INCOMING: thanks MyBuddyInc!
-Matty Mcintyre, 1.5 -2
-Christy Mathewson, dark cap. Auth. - 1
-Walter Johnson, pitching. Auth.
-Hal Chase, Pink. Auth.
-Johnny Evers, Auth.
-Ed Cicotte, Auth. 

Please let me know what you have!
-NJ
I forgot to mention - I am on the lookout for good deals on commons as well. Any of the cards from the list for sale out there?
Help me out with this list!

Mr. Titus, a.k.a. "the 'Stache" is comin' home! 12.5% complete, sell me the other 7! 
[url=http://postimg.org/image/fw2ac3z61/][img]http://s28.postimg.org/fw2ac3z61/215.jpg[/img][/url]
Not in the best condition, but I am in love with it!
Then why do you have it for sale on eBay?

[quote name="VintageJay" post=1529274]Then why do you have it for sale on eBay?[/QUOTE]

Great question! Another member here asked about it as well. I have another deal pending for a similar Titus over on Blowout...so if that one comes to fruition I would no longer be in need of this one. If it falls through I will most likely take it down.
Sell me another Stache or a Carlos Smith, please!

Maybe it's just me but I feel like I've seen this thread 85 times.

At the risk of sounding rude I think everyone's seen this thread and maybe you should wait a little to bump it.

[quote name="Joshchisox08" post=1531133]Maybe it's just me but I feel like I've seen this thread 85 times.

At the risk of sounding rude I think everyone's seen this thread and maybe you should wait a little to bump it.[/QUOTE]

No rudeness taken, I just am under the impression that there are Carlos Smiths here! I've kept to the minimum of bumping every three days, I believe. Thanks for your concern :)
